title: How was the Karnataka SSLC exam in 2018? - Quora

response.answer_text: Karnataka Secondary Education Examination Board has conducted the Karnataka SSLC exam 2018 from 23 March to 4 April 2018. Around 8.50 lakh students have appeared for the exams this year. According to the information received from reliable sources, the Karntaka SSLC Exam 2018 has been conducted successfully. Now, all the students are eagerly waiting for their SSLC Result 2018 Karnataka, which is expected to be released in the first week of May 2018. Candidates should stay in tune with us for all the latest updates on the results.
